headline: Kari Lake Vows To Defend Arizona Against Federal Gov – Joe Biden Can Come Down Here & Arrest Me [VIDEOS]
author: Red Voice Media
sentences: But having played the game, Lake easily spun the question and noted how it wasn’t about Biden, it was about the election process and how the media is hiding key facts from the American people by simply not reporting it.
Although Kari Lake is still a gubernatorial candidate for Arizona, she has already captivated Republican voters and headlines for attacking the mainstream media promoting the Democrat’s agenda.
Completely shocked by the display of hatred in front of her, as can be seen in the video above, Lake said, “I’m still amazed that you say, ‘Your man Donald.’ That’s just so disrespectful.
During another interview, with “60 Minutes” Australia, journalist Liam Bartlett berated Lake with numerous questions surrounding former President Donald Trump and the Capitol Hill riot.
Once having a career within the mainstream media as an evening anchor for Fox 10 News in Phoenix, Lake abandoned her job after seeing how the media had become part of the problem.
While former President Donald Trump was hard on border security, in the first year of President Joe Biden, a staggering 1.7 million migrants were encountered at the border.
Tired of empty promises, Lake recently addressed the situation and claimed she would defend Arizona not from hordes of immigrants, but the federal government.

It’s obvious that you’ve come into this interview and you don’t like President Donald Trump.”
This piece was written by Zach Heilman on March 15, 2022.
While Lake had nothing to do with the riot and was only endorsed by Trump, Bartlett appeared to take out his disdain for the former President on Lake.
The opinions expressed by contributors and/or content partners are their own and do not necessarily reflect the views of LifeZette.
One of Lake’s main focuses since announcing her campaign was the Southern border crisis and how it is destroying Arizona.
Since then, the mainstream media has sought to discredit and vilify her on top of labeling her as a conspiracy theorist.
In the video below, a reporter tried to get Lake to denounce Biden as the president.
It originally appeared in RedVoiceMedia.com and is used by permission.
It’s obvious that you’ve come into this.
